name: Space Shooter (itch) (Hexy)
description:
This game is an Idle Shooter Game.
The point is get the most Score as possible!
Controls:
R - Reload the Laser's
Space - Shoot Laser's
A - Move Left
D - Move right
ESC - Go back to main menu
*LEADERBOARDS ARE STILL IN BETA SO THEY ARE NOT IMPLEMENTED BUT POST THEM IN COMUNITY*
